summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Twenty-second Avenue Northwest, in The City of Seattle, from Ballard Avenue to Shilshole Avenue, by planking the same and constructing wooden walks thereon, in accordance with Resolution No. 1457 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
